description: A tool for calculating the time difference between a starting time (baseTime) and a target time (targetTime). Both inputs must be absolute timestamps, not offsets.

input.baseTime: String, optional. The starting timestamp for the calculation. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss' (24-hour). If omitted, the system will use the current time (UTC+8) as the base. This field defines the 'from' time in the difference calculation.
input.targetTime: String, required. The comparison timestamp. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss' (24-hour). This field defines the 'to' time in the difference calculation. The result will represent the elapsed time from baseTime to targetTime.

output.result: String. The time difference between the two timestamps, formatted as 'YY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss' (years, months, days, hours, minutes, seconds).
output.error: String. Returned only when the operation fails, e.g., invalid time format.
